node.title: People rescued from floodwaters, dam spills after heavy rain lashes parts of NSW
node.description: Wyangala Dam in the NSW Lachlan Valley overflows and elsewhere, people are rescued from their cars in floodwaters, after heavy rain pounds partsÂ of New South Wales.
node.content:
["A dam is overflowing, and elsewhere, people have been plucked from their cars in floodwaters, after heavy rain pounded parts of New South Wales.", "All eyes are on Wyangala Dam in the New South Wales Lachlan Valley where inflows generated by significant rain over the past 24 hours have refilled the reservoir.", "Water NSW was able to create some storage capacity before the recent rain, however, the dam is\u00a0spilling once again.", "A spokesperson for Water NSW said inflows to Wyangala were expected to peak on Friday afternoon.", "\"With more rain possible and inflows likely to increase to a peak of 65-70 gigalitres later today, Water NSW is working with the Bureau of Meteorology and the NSW State Emergency Service to monitor the situation.\"", "", "
Flooding at Blayney in the Central West.(ABC Central West: Micaela Hambrett)
", "Further north, capacity at Burrendong Dam in the NSW Macquarie Valley has risen to 109 per cent overnight, pushing the storage into the flood surcharge zone.", "However, Burrendong Dam has a capacity of 150 per cent, which means that no change to the current low rate of water releases will be required.", "Many changing warnings are expected over the next few days, so please keep up to date with your local warnings at ABC Emergency.\u00a0", "", "
Flooding at March, near Orange, overnight.(Supplied: Pru Lindfield)
", "
Floodwater rescues
", "A number of people have been rescued from floodwaters, as heavy rain and strong winds continue to lash parts\u00a0of New South Wales.", "The State Emergency Service\u00a0received 145 calls for help in the state's Central West overnight.\u00a0", "Many of the call-outs were in response to properties flooding, while houses at Perthville, near Bathurst, were evacuated during the night.", "A young boy was rescued from a car in floodwater this morning at Euchareena, north of Orange.", "", "
Flooding near Orange.(ABC News: Micaela Hambrett)
", "Ambulance NSW said\u00a0he was uninjured.", "A man was also rescued from the roof of his car at Stuart Town\u00a0after attempting to drive through floodwaters.", "Orange received 77 millimetres of rain\u00a0in 12 hours, making it the wettest 24-hour period in the city in nine years.", "Several roads around Bathurst have been closed due to flooding, while sandbags are being put in place at properties along the Macquarie River at Bathurst.", "The State Emergency Service (SES) Southern Zone Commander Barry Griffiths said people needed to be prepared.", "\"If your property is potentially exposed to flooding start thinking about moving your possessions to higher places in the house.\"", "", "
Gordon Edgell Bridge, Bathurst.(ABC News: Micaela Hambrett)
", "
'More than a month's rainfall in 24 hours'\u00a0\u00a0
", "The Bureau of Meteorology's Hugh McDowell said there was heavy rainfall in coastal and inland regions overnight, with peaks in certain areas.", "Across the state though,\u00a0the rainfall during the last day wasn't as heavy or widespread as expected.", "", "
Creeks have been overflowing around Broken Hill, including at Silverton.(ABC Broken Hill: Sarah McConnell)
", "\"We saw the highest totals in the Hunter region. Mount\u00a0Palmer had 96mm\u00a0and around Newcastle itself, we saw 87.8mm\u00a0at Merewether,\"\u00a0he said.", "", "
A heavy rain event hit Dubbo yesterday afternoon, bringing flash flooding to some areas.(ABC Western Plains: Gary-Jon Lysaght)
", "\"The widespread totals were more in the 25 to 33mm range. We\u00a0didn't realise the moderate to major flooding that could have occurred if we'd seen those totals more widespread.\"", "Severe thunderstorms have now eased in the Mid North Coast, Hunter, North West Slopes and Plains and Lower Western districts.", "In the Coffs Harbour region on the Mid North Coast, SES crews are responding to calls for help from residents still repairing the damage from recent hailstorms.", "", "
Flooding has closed a bridge at Bathurst.(Supplied: Bathurst Regional Council)
", "
Relief for growers
", "Moree agronomist Tony Lockrey said there was a relief amongst growers that overnight rainfalls were less than expected, with minor rather than moderate flooding now predicted.", "", "
The Gwydir River peaked at minor flood level.\u00a0(ABC Upper Hunter: Jake Lapham)
", "\"Just hoping to get a bit of sunshine and get back on some paddocks.\"", "Growers are now hoping to see some prolonged warm weather to help mitigate some impacts.", "There have been falls between 60 to 120mm throughout the week, which will see quality downgrades for crops and see delays to harvesting.", "\"Harvest is going to drag out well into December and possibly into January,\" Mr Lockrey said.", "", "
Children make the most of heavy rainfall at\u00a0Dubbo.(Supplied: Tenille Williams)
"]
